Question.Subject: i can't play any video or audio online?
Question.Content: i can't play any video file (youtube) online, neither can i play audio files (embedded files that play using windows media player). not sure why, because i could a few days ago.
Question.ChosenAnswer: It's possible that the flash plugins have un-installed themselves. try windows update, re-installing sound card drivers, installing a different web browser such as firefox or google chrome or try windows system restore

Answer.Content: It's possible that the flash plugins have un-installed themselves. try windows update, re-installing sound card drivers, installing a different web browser such as firefox or google chrome or try windows system restore
